stances.comment: Should go out alongside or after EL SSZ transition, but CL shouldn't wait
Would support if extended dev timeline
Concerned about complexity of bundling FOCIL with ePBS, may delay mainnet
Prioritize even if it requires longer fork cycle
Only if on top of Fusaka and proposer look ahead field exists in beacon state
Prefer over 8071, but needs security analysis for shortened WS period
Setting the right fee is tough; tradeoff between too high or too low
Added complexity: new beacon state fields, process epoch changes; unclear if it would push operators to consolidate
Prefer 8061 over 8071, but fine with 8071 as is; suggest adding shared queue concept
